options: Mars Rheam Silviam amat: Mars loves Rhea Silvia.
Rhea Silvia habet infantes: Rhea Silvia has babies.
Aemulius infantes in flumine ponit: Amulius places the babies on the river.
Pater Tiber pueros servat: Father Tiber protects the boys.
Romulus et Remus regiam revincunt: Romulus and Remus reconquer the palace.
Romulus Remum necat: Romulus kills Remus.
Romulus est rex Romae: Romulus is the king of Rome.
